subject: Re: New Price Card Melbourne-costing and time frame please?
preview: Thanks Heath,  I'll run a couple checks at my end this morning also just to be sure.  Danielle

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath,

I'll run a couple checks at my end this morning also just to be sure.

Danielle

Hi Danielle,

We have been working on this overnight and found the issue. The below three accepted jobs did not have the 5% markup applied. 

proposal-7810 - $ 6,697.21 - Pay with EFT
proposal-7780 - $ 4,675.12 - Pay with Credit Card
proposal-7774 - $ 3,012.60 - Pay Later

Firstly, we have made sure that we have fixed this, so all quotes that will be accepted and were created before the price rice/removal of the 5% markup will be based on the old prices +5%. 

Apologies for this, it becomes difficult to stay on top of the hidden pricing as mentioned previously. In fact, we hid it so well that in our testing we missed this scenario. Please run a couple of tests at your end as well, we are on standby to ensure all is running smoothly.

Hi Heath,

We are seeing Quotes in the quote platform that have been accepted and paid for. That are now showing in the platform at a 5% lower price?

I have attached a couple of examples for you of the PDF I received from the client when they accepted and what the Quote platform is now showing. We are trying to upload some quotes into Xero that were accepted prior to the automation you set up. I'm concerned that Other historical quotes have not retained the old price card or 5% hidden discount that was supposed to remain. Can you please look at this ASAP?



Danielle GerlachBUSINESS MANAGER

0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Perfect, thank you.

Danielle GerlachBUSINESS MANAGER

0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Danielle,

Confirming newly created quotes will have the new inventory pricing and will not have the markup.

Please note, if you edit ANY existing quotes that aren't yet accepted, they will have the new pricing applied. You can however go into the quote/s and manually set the pricing back to the original amounts.

If you don't edit an existing quote, they can be accepted, and no pricing increases will be applied.

Additionally, any existing quotes that currently have the 5% markup will always still have this markup, regardless of if you edit the quote or not. This is because the 5% markup is triggered by date ranges.

Hi Heath,

That is great news, thank you!

Getting this done overnight at no additional cost - 1.5hr is way faster than what we could have done ourselves, what a star!

Confirming this will be for new & newly edited Quotes only?

Danielle GerlachBUSINESS MANAGER

0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Danielle, 

The task took 1.5hrs, so this will be included in your Care Plan, with no additional charges.

Confirming we have updated the pricing and removed the 5% markup.

Timing is great thanks Heath.

Are there additional fees for you to complete this for us?

Hi Danielle, 

We can update these for you outside of working hours this evening. 

Please note, if you edit ANY existing quotes that aren't yet accepted, they will have the new pricing applied. You can however go into the quote/s and manually set the pricing back to the original amounts. 

If you don't edit an existing quote, they can be accepted, and no pricing increases will be applied. 

Additionally, any existing quotes that currently have the 5% markup will always still have this markup, regardless of if you edit the quote or not. This is because the 5% markup is triggered by date ranges. 

Please confirm if we are ok to proceed tonight?

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


Nice speaking with you today.


Please see attached, the new Melbourne pricing as discussed. The "New Price" will be used to lift pricing across the whole inventory list and negate the need for the hidden premium currently on our system of 5% across all quotes. We must ensure this is removed once the price increases have been made.


There are items highlighted in BLUE which we would like added to our inventory list as well please.


Would you please provide an estimate of the cost for you to execute the changes and a time frame for completion?


Thank you,


Danielle Gerlach
BUSINESS MANAGER

0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195
novaricollective.com.au
